@metadata.name: hash
@metadata.comment: The library is imported as default, it is "implied", and can be fully identified by library prefix. This is nearly always named as "mw.hash", as it is part of the standard mw-lib, so it is pretty safe to assume it can be used as prefix.

mw.hash 001.description: Hashes a string value with the specified algorithm.

mw.hash 002.description: Returns a list of supported hashing algorithms.
